View on GitHub

show all lines without duplication

sort -u and uniq is the same effect.

sort file | uniq

show not duplicated lines

sort file | uniq -u

show duplicated lines only

sort file | uniq -d

count all lines

sort file | uniq -c

count not duplicated lines

sort file | uniq -uc

count only duplicated lines

sort file | uniq -dc
